title: New Game Mode
body:
Dear Riot, I enjoy League immensely, but there is one thing missing that would make it the best game out. A game mode where all that matters is Kills. A first to 1000 kills deathmatch style murder pit! 
please make this happen.

replies.body: we got a zed/yasuo main here
This would be amazing- if there were 10 players and it was every man for himself, 1v9ing and surviving would feel so satisfying

I like the idea.
The map can be dominion or twisted treeline (so that its not too big)

Please make it happen, riot
Not 1000  kills but it'd be pretty fun though. Just an all in brawl. Maybe have rounds. Once you die you're out for the round.. 10 rounds to win
1000 kills? that would take hours. is it free for all or there are teams?
